question: I am a 19/f thinking of not getting married because I do not favor overly sexual marriages unlike many men. I would prefer intercourse to be restricted mostly to procreation. Afraid to die alone.
answer:
QUESTION
My decision is one that has been taken seriously and after quite some deliberation. My ideal physical intimacy includes kissing and caressing but not sex unless greatly limited. I have also come to value my chastity a great deal and hesitant of losing it. My only fear is of dying and living safely alone and opinion of family but otherwise I am very comfortable with the idea. Even if I do decide to, I want to do it when I am ready and not because of family (parents want me to get married at 24) or other pressures.
ANSWER
